GET /accounts/{account_id}/audit_logs.description: Gets a list of audit logs for an account. Can be filtered by who made the change, on which zone, and the timeframe of the change.

schema.description: Identifier
Finds a specific log by its ID.
Indicates that this request is an export of logs in CSV format.
Filters by the action type.
Filters by the IP address of the request that made the change by specific IP address or valid CIDR Range.
Filters by the email address of the actor that made the change.

oneOf.description: Limits the returned results to logs newer than the specified date. A `full-date` that conforms to RFC3339.
Limits the returned results to logs newer than the specified date. A `date-time` that conforms to RFC3339.
Limits the returned results to logs older than the specified date. A `full-date` that conforms to RFC3339.
Limits the returned results to logs older than the specified date. A `date-time` that conforms to RFC3339.

schema.description: Filters by the name of the zone associated to the change.
Changes the direction of the chronological sorting.
Sets the number of results to return per page.
Defines which page of results to return.
Indicates whether or not to hide user level audit logs.

result.description: A boolean that indicates if the action attempted was successful.

type.description: A short string that describes the action that was performed.

email.description: The email of the user that performed the action.

id.description: The ID of the actor that performed the action. If a user performed the action, this will be their User ID.

ip.description: The IP address of the request that performed the action.

type.description: The type of actor, whether a User, Cloudflare Admin, or an Automated System.

id.description: A string that uniquely identifies the audit log.

metadata.description: An object which can lend more context to the action being logged. This is a flexible value and varies between different actions.

newValue.description: The new value of the resource that was modified.

oldValue.description: The value of the resource before it was modified.

id.description: Identifier
An identifier for the resource that was affected by the action.

type.description: A short string that describes the resource that was affected by the action.

when.description: A UTC RFC3339 timestamp that specifies when the action being logged occured.

success.description: Whether the API call was successful

email.description: The email of the user that performed the action.

ip.description: The IP address of the request that performed the action.

type.description: The type of actor, whether a User, Cloudflare Admin, or an Automated System.

id.description: A string that uniquely identifies the audit log.

metadata.description: An object which can lend more context to the action being logged. This is a flexible value and varies between different actions.

newValue.description: The new value of the resource that was modified.

oldValue.description: The value of the resource before it was modified.

id.description: Identifier
An identifier for the resource that was affected by the action.

when.description: A UTC RFC3339 timestamp that specifies when the action being logged occured.

success.description: Whether the API call was successful
Whether the API call was successful

x-cfDeprecation.description: This endpoint and its related APIs are deprecated in favor of the `/accounts` equivalent APIs, which have a broader range of features and are backwards compatible with these API.
